column1: Yesterday the Semiquincentennial Commission delivered our Report to the President to @VP Pence. Tasked w/ planning the 250th anniversary of our founding I am grateful to be a part of this milestone in our nation's history!  Official White House Photo by D. Myles Cullen https://t.co/MjfDdRK5YH
Congratulations to @GovernorKayIvey for once again being one of the most popular governors in America.  https://t.co/SP42UQlzwz

As we celebrate #ReligiousFreedomDay I want to take a moment to applaud @realDonaldTrump for his commitment to protecting our fundamental right to freely worship in peace. This right should never be taken for granted. https://t.co/wyeleTE9lp
#USMCA is one step closer to being signed into law.   Yet another promise made and kept by @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/3pF9gkxOVS

Today I spoke on the House floor on behalf of the millions of babies aborted since Roe v. Wade. I am unapologetically pro-life pro-child and pro-family. I pray that we soon see the day that Roe v. Wade is overturned and the sanctity of life is returned to our nation. https://t.co/i26eBRgC4r

This is excellent news! Investing in infrastructure is a key element in building stronger communities across Alabama. Thank you @GovernorKayIvey for your commitment to investing in the future of our great state. https://t.co/PkbDP9GBlk

I'm thankful to hear that @GovernorKayIvey had a great doctor's report and is considered cured. Let's keep the Governor and her team in our prayers for continued healing.

The Democrats continue to waste valuable time with unfounded impeachment proceedings & now unnecessary restrictions on the President’s authority to protect our nation.  We should be focused on the economy strengthen our military & maintaining American leadership in the world.

As noted in today’s briefing from the Administration the existing authorizations allow the POTUS to take necessary action to protect our troops already in Iraq. Both the drone strike and the troop and munitions movements are covered by that principle.

@NASA_SLS @NASA_Marshall @BoeingSpace SLS is the largest rocket stage ever built and the first exploration-class rocket built since the Apollo program.  Proud to fund this important national asset in the CJS Appropriations bill!

I thought the address @realDonaldTrump gave to the nation was both strong and appropriate.  No one wants war but that decision ultimately is in the hands of the Iranian regime.

For over a year @HouseGOP has asked Democrat leadership to put their politics aside and bring #USMCA to the floor. I'm glad they've finally brought this long-awaited deal up for a vote.  It's a great day for Alabama & I look forward to voting yes! #USMCANow

President Trump & @USTradeRep Lighthizer promised to re-balance & modernize the outdated NAFTA agreement with a high-standard trade deal. I applaud them in enhancing relations with two of our largest trade partners.  #USMCA is yet another promise made & kept by @realDonaldTrump.
#USMCA is also estimated to increase U.S. production of automotive parts and employment in the sector. These are huge wins for two of Alabama's biggest industries.

Today I will vote yes on @realDonaldTrump 's United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement. #USMCA opens new market access for Alabama & U.S. poultry producers and is expected to increase agricultural exports.

I think George Bernard Shaw summed up what the Democrats impeachment will ultimately be for them: "There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.”  It's what they've wanted all along now they have it and it may cost them dearly.

@realDonaldTrump The people of Alabama's 4th Congressional District gave President Trump his highest vote percentage in the country 80.3 percent. They continue to support him today and so does their Congressman!

I voted no on impeachment. It isn’t @realDonaldTrump  who has abused his power.  It is my colleagues on the other side of the aisle who are abusing one of the most powerful tools entrusted to Congress in the Constitution for their own purposes. https://t.co/LkvaLKe9Iq
